channel.title: Needing squig.txt? where do i get it?(SCAR)
channel.description:
is there anyone out there that has the Squig.txt include for SCAR? i need it for an auto firemaker. just pm me it or post here. i ask this cuz SCAR 3.15 isnt dling it. :confused:
rep will be given for the first working include posted or sent.

item.title: Needing squig.txt? where do i get it?(SCAR)
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

[quote=“geeky_kid, post:3, topic:267118”]what includes should i use?

im looking for a good firemaking script with anti-ban for SCAR(include includes aswell pls).

anyone got?[/quote]

SRL is the current only, up-to-date public include library. In the newer versions of scar under ‘File’ there is an option to download the newest version of SRL directly (it does all the work of moving, extracting ect ect for you). I’d suggest doing some research before asking any more questions… the information is easy to find.

Read full topic
item.source: Needing squig.txt? where do i get it?(SCAR)
